blockchain.name: Silly Project 1
blockchain.desc: Your proofs are null(ified) and void here.

blockchain.name: recovery
blockchain.desc: Are you recovering from your sign-ache ? You need first to provide a Proof-of-Work before deploying a contract. The script deploy_contract.py shows how to do it.

crypto.name: cert
crypto.desc:
Here is the admin's public key:

N = b678170a2e2faf2a29d6b236a8508c4a27a828c5c9f40ad467768ef60af30eda4e8596e4cbc3919db6d104ea1155025052918fb8fb3ef78510c6ea41f5be60e26103fb0f36a71883a23027f544b08ad35fc328b184e83f8973695e339d75fe4565e90457f051ba327eb14d77d76fc60b8800e5d04d9407561dc708889ee8b001

e = 010001

Forge a signature to authenticate as admin.

Hold on! Let me quickly sign a welcome message for you

crypto.name: hsb 2.2
crypto.desc: We were noticed of a vulnerability allowing unauthorized decryption of internal secrets. The sign function has been disabled while our engineers are working on a fix. Rest assured, you can continue to use the rest of the service for your crypto operations.

crypto.name: thirtytwo
crypto.desc: Contrary to popular belief, Shamir's secret sharing is not food. Rather, it is a cryptographic scheme that allows a secret to be split into multiple shares, such that a certain number of shares are required to reconstruct the secret. In this challenge, the dealer will give you one share and you will cooperate with other signers to sign a message using Boneh-Lynn-Shacham (BLS) on the Barreto-Naehrig curve. The Barrero-Naehrig curve is a pairing-friendly elliptic curve that is not to be confused with the Barreto-Lynn-Scott curve, also termed BLS.

crypto.name: wild signatures
crypto.desc: Can you even sign? Help leo get the flag as soon as possible.

misc.name: Hopfield sends his regards...
misc.desc: ...too bad they're hidden in the noise

misc.name: order 66
misc.desc:
Let the clones get the flag for you!

Note: the file name is flag.

mobile.name: At your Service
mobile.desc: is this what they meant when they said that my phone is serving a purpose?

pwn.name: Holy pwn
pwn.desc:
Countless pwns led you to this final challenge. In front of you, the Temple of God stands massive. This challenge will require something that trascends Linux; something only possible in the realm of God. A Holy Pwn!

Note: it's a stock image of ZealOS. Chall.ZC is the only added file (minor modifications done to Once.ZC and HomeSys.ZC but only to remove annoying irrelevant stuff) Note: if you are experiencing hitting the same breakpoint over and over, take a step back and think for a bit before panicking and assuming something is broken

pwn.name: Lake halfway house
pwn.desc: Dear students, We have been getting reports that our heap menu was being exploited. We have taken appropriate measures to secure the heap menu using memory safe javaScript. Please use responsibly and refrain from fruitless hacking attempts, your time is better spent preparing for your exams.🤓

pwn.name: bash plus plus
pwn.desc: What if you had a shell where you could only do maths?

pwn.name: fsophammer
pwn.desc: Weild the fsop hammer and get the flag!

rev.name: Nerfed
rev.desc: After some bash antics, we're going back to the basics. So just some simple snake, but when I invited the laplace deamon to play, it got messy. Btw you already have the flag, can't you see it?

rev.name: a smol rev
rev.desc: another day, another compiler hihi.... flag is on fd 24 :3

rev.name: silent lake
rev.desc: Can you make it to the finals?

web.name: LakeCDN
web.desc: A secure alternative to cdnjs, jsDelivr, unpkg.

web.name: yascc
web.desc: A very secure, open-source and self-hosted forum software. With us, your data is safe!
